meanings.definition: The dates on which a television or radio program is scheduled to be broadcast.
meanings.sent1: I always check the airdates of my favorite shows to make sure I don't miss them.
meanings.sent2: The airdates for the new season of the show were announced yesterday.
meanings.sent3: My friend joked that she wished her birthday airdates were as eagerly anticipated as TV show premieres.
meanings.sent4: The airdates of the upcoming episodes were like little milestones in my calendar.
meanings.sent5: The airdates of the show were like beacons guiding me through the week.

meanings.definition: To schedule or broadcast a television or radio program.
meanings.sent1: The network will airdates the new series during prime time.
meanings.sent2: They decided to airdates the special episode on a Friday night.
meanings.sent3: I can't wait to airdates our school project on the local TV channel!
meanings.sent4: She will airdates the live event to viewers all around the country.
meanings.sent5: The radio station will airdates the interview with the famous singer tomorrow morning.
